channel.title: Java Is not recognized as a internal command error
channel.description:
hi i get the error when i click run batch/runserver and i've downloaded the jdk update 6... and when i click run it says[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command operable program or batch file.[/code]
I've got the jkd update 6 software i think i mite need more because i accendtly deleted sum lulz! can u give me links of what ones to down load thanks and i`ll be very great full thanks

item.title: Java Is not recognized as a internal command error
item.dc:creator: @Kryptick Kryptick
item.description:
@Kryptick wrote:

The JRE installation, by default, automatically sets the Java classpath.
Might want to check if you even have a path variable.

Read full topic
item.source: Java Is not recognized as a internal command error

item.title: Java Is not recognized as a internal command error
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Then they aren’t set correctly if you’re getting that error.
